attributes.action: PM stand down! No NHS restructure! Benefits cuts! Police cuts! No Confidence!!!
attributes.background: David Cameron has fed nothing but lies to the UK. Scare tactics on everything he says. He promised no restructuring to the NHS, he's cut benefits to the most needy, cut the police at the time we need them most, cut our proud armed services. Now his family are implicated in the tax avoidance scandal

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. If you would like the Government to change its policies, you could start a new petition calling for a specific change.
